title: Type ID for Givecamp Client
content:
Greetings from Cleveland!

making a probono site for a non profit client via Give Camp #clegc and looking for a type ID from the sign on their building. Looks to be hand drawn but if there is a typeface for this one that would be awesome.

Thanks!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130821234822im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Screen%20Shot%202013-07-19%20at%2011_5704.13.03%20PM.png)
author: HANKT

comments.content:
found one that's a bit clearer
